title: Rent ceiling removed, housing quantity increases

content.question: If an effective rent ceiling is eliminated, which of the following is most likely to occur in the rental housing market?

choices.label: An increase in the demand for housing, resulting in a decrease in the quantity of housing supplied
An increase in rents, resulting in an increase in the quantity of housing supplied
An increase in the demand for housing, resulting in an increase in the quantity of housing demanded
A decrease in rents, resulting in an increase in the quantity of housing supplied
A decrease in the demand for housing, resulting in an increase in the quantity of housing supplied

content.answer: An increase in rents, resulting in an increase in the quantity of housing supplied

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
